content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_button
inventory=[{"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 12}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 38, "index": 17}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "clay", "quantity": 34, "index": 33}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 37}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}]
thought: I need to craft jungle_planks, which requires 1 jungle_log. I have 1 jungle_log at slot 28, therefore I will move it to slot 1.
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_button
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 12}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 38, "index": 17}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "clay", "quantity": 34, "index": 33}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 37}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}]
thought: I can now craft 4 jungle_planks by moving them from the craft slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_button
inventory=[{"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 12}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 38, "index": 17}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "clay", "quantity": 34, "index": 33}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 37}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}]
thought: Now I need to craft the jungle_button. This requires 1 jungle_planks, which I have at slot 11. Therefore, I will move it to slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_button
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 33, "index": 10}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 27, "index": 12}, {"type": "sandstone_stairs", "quantity": 46, "index": 15}, {"type": "stone_slab", "quantity": 38, "index": 17}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral_block", "quantity": 6, "index": 21}, {"type": "clay", "quantity": 34, "index": 33}, {"type": "purple_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 48, "index": 37}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}]

act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 1
